# ByteConverter.FromSingle method

Writes a 32-bit floating-point value to a buffer.

```csharp
public void FromSingle(float value, Span<byte> buffer)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The 32-bit floating-point value to write to the buffer. |
| buffer | The buffer to write the value to. |
